   Hugar replied to these question that this femme bot was asking him.  
"Yeah, I remember that my name is Hugar and that I belonged to the Cybertron 
Mob on Cybertron,..."  Hugar said as he then had to start telling lies. 
"...And I remember that I was being chased when I ran into an asteroid and 
fell to this planet."
